content.rendered:
Jiliaaa Magic Lamp is an online slot game that take player have magical journey into world of the Arabian Nights. The game is set against a backdrop of a starry night sky and a beautiful palace, with reels filled with symbols of magic carpets, genies, lamps, and other mystical items. Players have the chance to win big with its exciting bonus features such as free spins, wild symbols, and multipliers. With its stunning graphics and engaging gameplay, Jiliaaa Magic Lamp is sure to delight slot game enthusiasts and fans of the Arabian Nights.

Magic Lamp Game Rules

  • All winning symbols must start from the left reel and appear in order to the right.
  • All winning scores = bet odds X bet amount
  • Up to 15625 Pay lines.
  • Only the highest winning amount of each line is paid out.
  • The game round is invalid if a malfunction occurs and the game results cannot be validated.

Magic Lamp Special Symbols

Scatter

  • Up to a single scatter symbol can appear on each reel. When there are 3 or more on the field, the player enters a Free Game.
  • The more scatter symbols you get, the more Free Games, up to 50. The symbol will not appear in a Free Game.

Lamp Genie

  • When it appears, it marks different winning scores.
  • Marked scores are X1, X2, X3, X5, X10, X20 and X50 of total bets.
  • When appears with  in free game, you win the score of that Lamp Genie mark!
  • When calculating line bonuses, each Lamp Genie of different scores are treated as the same symbol.

Wild

The Genie Gili slot game features a special Wild symbol depicting Aladdin, which can only appear during free spins. This symbol replaces all symbols in the game. And when the Wild and Genie symbols appear at the same time, they suck all the Genie symbols together and win big! making it possible to get more rewards.
